originalText.text: Nice affordable housing with too many financials problems.  When I moved in we had security we no longer have security.  The tenants predominantly Africa Americans are prejudice and would prefer not to interview Whites, Asians, Hispanics and more.  They need to get rid of all the board members because of infighting.  Corrupt!  Do not apply here.

originalText.text: Prestige Management Company is a new management company for Riverbend. I have lived here for over 10 years. The tenants for the most part are kind but the management company, especially the manager (Ms. McMillan) is a robotic irritant!! Speaks to you in a childish low tone voice & just runs circles around questions that should be bluntly answered! I have not had to deal with someone /anyone like her before since I have lived here. Even the workers speak about her in a disrespectful manner. We are suppose to be a community yet she offers no help & just holds a cold presence about her. The company has a payment website for paying your maintenance but its never correct, hardly ever updated, it tells you when your next payment can be made so you don't have a date option & the office doesn't even know what the website shows because they see something completely different on the system they hv which doesn't help when you are trying to dispute a charge that shouldn't be on your account! I have been dealing with a charge that I was told they would remove since January that they continue each month to tack on more penalties because they haven't removed it. Now 4 months later they want to say they cant remove it & I'm stuck paying $200 for a $50 charge, $150 in penalties! I have personally dropped off proof that the charge is inaccurate (after a useless meeting with Ms McMillan)  a week later today I called the ofc  since I hadn't heard back from her. Her words were she hasn't even looked at it! Lets just say my husband & I have started to look for another place to raise our family...

originalText.text: It's an apartment complex in Harlem.  Very nice view from the outside Looking in. Clean grounds. Polite security staff. How ever I didn't  see inside so to be honest. So I can't give a detailed review of the indoors.

originalText.text: Clean, safe, well monitored. Residents are polite and respectful. Great neighborhood. All amenities very close and convenient.
